extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • alreadyExists

        static int alreadyExists(FoodItem item,
                         java.lang.Integer low,
                         java.lang.Integer high)
        check the entire inventory if id of the food item in parameter already exist in the array, return location implement recursive binary search
        Parameters:
        item - food item for checking
        low - the left limit of current searching range
        high - the right limit of current searching range
        Returns:
        -1 if cannot find item, or index of item found

      • addItem

        static boolean addItem(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                       boolean fromFile)
        adding a new food item into inventory and initializing it
        Parameters:
        scanner - Scanner object for inputting information
        fromFile - reading from file or not. Prevent printing if reading from file
        Returns:
        operation status: true if successful

      • updateQuantity

        boolean updateQuantity(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                       boolean buyOrSell)
        update the quantity of a product via buy or sell operations
        Parameters:
        scanner - Scanner object for inputting information
        buyOrSell - whether the operation is buying (adding)
        Returns:
        operation status: true if successful

        Returns:
